name: beanbag
description: Generic CouchDB driver built upon the teepee module
author: Andreas Lind @papandreou <andreas@one.com>

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha --report text --report lcov -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
